short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empowering job seekers with smart and efficient tools to land their dream job.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hire a Human Assistant for your Job Hunt
Who will apply to job applications on your behalf with Custom Resumes and Cover Letters, so you can focus on Networking and Interview Prep.

Less than 2% of applications receive interview calls. 
Spend your time and effort wisely.

Our assistants save you 100+ hours of grunt work.
